name: aMAZEballs (Bellok)
description:
aMAZEballs is a simple marble-maze game with randomized levels and there is no end to them. You can play as many mazes as you want and never run out of mazes.
I do not yet have a timer working for the levels for online competitive features. (e.i., leaderboards. I am hoping to have all of that available soon.

Roadmap stuff:

  1. Pause menu
  2. Respawn mechanic in case you fall through the world
  3. Make variations for the mazes so that you don't always experience the same environment. This is currently the largest weakness of this game.
  4. SKINS!!! Everyone loves being able to customize their marble. This is probably going to be the hardest for me... UI stuff... blegh.
